markdownRemark.html: This 9-hole, par 3 and 4 golf course is located in the prestigious residential development known as "La Resina". The pleasant layout winds between attractive lakes, tropical gardens and olive trees.

frontmatter.title: La Resina Golf & Country Club
frontmatter.description: This 9-hole, par 3 and 4 golf course is located in the prestigious residential development known as "La Resina". The pleasant layout winds between attractive lakes, tropical gardens and olive trees.
frontmatter.address: Urb. La Resina, Arroyo de las Cañas S/N, Ctra. N-340, Km 162,5, 29680 Estepona, Málaga, Spain
frontmatter.price: Highest green fee weekdays 16.00 euros, Highest green fee weekends 23.00 euros
